Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

From the brand

DaFang is committed to developing and designing organizer and storage clean tools products, included broom rack and mop holder. Save your home space and make your life more easy.

IMILLET Broom Organizer

Tidy Your Home: 5 ball slots and 6 hooks design, organize your annoying cleaning tools within small space.
Spring Loaded: Special spring clips design with rolling rubber ball that make sure the broom and mop will not fall out,including wet mop, dirty rakes, stick vacuum and other heavy stuff
Wide Compatible To Everywhere: Apply to your garage, garden, kitchen, laundry, offices and more. It is strong and sturdy. Keep solid on the wall with the slots and screws (Included). It can organize most of tools of your home.
Heavy Duty: Mop holder grip everything tightly and securely. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total. Made of high quality ABS and slots and screws.We upgraded our products after 2018 July 1st, and we improved the quality of this products that are easy-to-drop. Now the products can grip everything tightly and securely.
Easy Install: Wall mounted, detailed installation steps on the package. Easy to install with slots and screws (included).

  • There are 5 ball slots and 6 hooks so you can organize as much cleaning utilities, organizer designed to hold various household objects with handles of varying thickness, Hooks can be folded up and out of the way.
  • Simply insert a handle into a slot and a rounded, spring loaded, rolling ball automatically adjusts to the handle’s thickness and grips it securely, Easy release by lifting the handle.
  • Fast and Easy to install, 6 screws to hold the wall mount organizer to ensure strong and sturdy holding. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)



WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.
HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick the tape fastener bars together. Fold the edge at least 4 times up and snap the buttons together. It can be adjusted to 3 different sizes to suit your needs.
DRAWSTRING TOP AND TAPE FASTENER BOTTOM: The top drawstring is made from nylon rope. You can easily adjust the opening size of the bag with the drawstring to dispose the garbage. The bottom of this bag is stitched left and right with two pieces of tape fastener bars. The tape fastener bottom makes emptying a breeze. Easy to clean and empty.
SNAP BUTTON STRAP: This car trash bag has a handle strap on top of the holder for you to hang them anywhere you like! There are two snap buttons on the strap. The strap is adjustable and allows you to hang it up or take it down hassle-free. The sturdy handle can be easily hung on car seat, armrest, headrest or anywhere inside your car or any other places that you deem fit.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BAG: This car trash bag is the perfect solution to keep and organise your used plastic grocery bags. It also could also be used to store undergarments, socks, baby washcloths and bibs. It is the best solution for space saving. You can hang it anywhere in the kitchen, bedroom, storeroom or workshop.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Neat Little Holder!

This car seat gap organizer box can help you become a neat holder!

Look No Further For Your Keys！

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

High Quality

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Look No Further For Your Keys

Adds CONVENIENCE & SPACE for your keys, cards, money, charger, phone, and cosmetics，receipts. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Intimate Settings

These car gap filler organizers can make it easier for you to find the ‘car items’ you need on the road. The precise fit of the design transforms the organizer into several high boxes with storage compartments. Make your Armrest console organized and looks much cleaner.

Easy To Install

These car seat gap fillers with cup holders can be easily washed with water. Besides, the installation is relatively simple, no tools required, installation car seat gap filler just inserts the between car seat gap filler and console, Can find a suitable position.

Specification:

Product Color: Black Main Material: Flocking materials, PU Leather, and ABS Plastic Suitable: Not was suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.6 inches(1.5 cm) and central console lower than the seat. Package size (L*W*H): 11.22in x 6.92in x 4.17in Product Weight: 1.91lb Package Content: 1 x Left Storage box 1 x Right Storage box 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth 2 x Car Back Seat Headrest Hooks

Say Goodbye to Mess – If you have problems on losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat gap filler is for you. It prevents small items from falling between the car seat gap, gives you a place to put change, pens, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach.
New Version Car Seat Gap Filler – This car seat organizer has a good texture that feels like a baby’s skin that is fine and smooth. The car storage organizer front seat is made of high-quality black ABS plastic and PU leather that cannot break, slip, bend or leave any scratches. With a velvet material pads that can prevent items from sliding and rattling.
Fashion Design and Driving Safety – This front seat gap filler will help you create a neat and clean environment. This seat gap filler fits the car seat gaps. Because it will not shake when you brake suddenly, and it is not too big to waste your car seat space. The new design added red stitching which adds to the overall appearance. Make your car more outstanding among friends.
Perfect Size Car Storage Organizer- Not suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.78 inches(2 cm) and central console lower than the seat. The size of the car seat gap organizer is 10.23 x 6.49 x 2.95 inches which is suitable for most vehicles. The cup holder can fit cups up to 2.75 inches in diameter. Just like the size of aluminum Coca-Cola. Please measure the distance between your seat and the console carefully before you purchase.
Excellent Service – 2 car seat back hooks and 1 microfiber cleaning cloth as the gift. We provide one year of free replacement of this car seat gap filler with cup holder and 6 months of quality assurance. Please rest assured to buy. If you are not 100% satisfied with your order, please email us directly, we promise to provide every customer with quality products and services.

Expansion Nails *2

The upper layer used to storage tools and hand drills. The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc. The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc. The side racks are for pliers and hammers.

Screwdriver Organizer

There are more than 10 holes in the tool rack, which can store screwdrivers of different sizes. Very convenient for your access.

Easy to Assemble

Just need to connect the gauge steel wire and plating with screws and hang it on the wall according to the instructions.

4 Drill Holders

Friendly design with 4 drill holders. It can store cordless drills, brush less drills,small corded drills,impact driver drills.

MADE FOR MOST TOOL ORGANIZATION: This tool organizer adopts unique multifunctional storage design with 15 holes for screwdrivers holder, 4 racks for pliers storage and two flat shelves to place other power tools. This tool storage helps you keep all your commonly used project tools neatly organized and within your arm’s reach.
THICKEN HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: Compared with other utility racks which made of thin wire, our drill holder has greater bearing capacity. It is made of thicken heavy compact steel metal, and the joint of the shelf uses a reinforced design. This shelf is strong enough to withstand a person of 50kgs.
REMOVABLE AND EASY TO INSTALL: The power tool organizer has a simple structure and easy to move. It comes with wrench, drywall anchors and pan head screws. It takes only a few minutes to install it, just need to drill holes and install screws. The installation guide is provided for you to check.
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Our power tool organizer wall mount is perfect to organize all kinds of garage stuff. And it’s widely used as screwdriver organizer, electric drill charging station and Father’s Day gift. It’s suitable for garage, tools room warehouse and so on due to its perfect size.
SATISFACTION SERVICE: Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this drill holder wall mount. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours. And we offer a 1-year guarantee on this product. Don’t worry about it.

Lzeodo

The Lzeodo is an enterprise specializing in the production and selling of power tools holder. We are committed to providing excellent products and services. Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this power tools storage. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours.

From the brand

Protect Your Tools

The Ryker Bag was Created to be an Accessible and Affordable Brand that Makes Every Manual Laborer’s Life Easier for Efficiency, Organization and Transport.

We’ve Taken Everything we Know About Tools and Created the Most Compact and Most Convenient Roll Up Bag that we know how.

Now it’s Your Turn to Enjoy the Benefit of our Vast Experience and the Expertise of the Designers who Put this Dream into Action!

Shop The Ryker Bag

Compact Design for More Tools – we’ve Developed a Tool Roll Bag of a Perfect Size – you’d Be Surprised by How Many Tools Fit in This Small Tool Bag : Place Wrenches Pliers Ratchets and More Into this Roll Up Tool Pouch
6 Pockets for All your Gear – This Roll Organizer has 4 Compartments for Tools & 2 Detachable + D Loops – a Unique Feature in Case You Need to Carry Smaller Items Like Drill Bits Screws & Spare Parts
Premium Quality & Ultra Durable Materials – This Roll Up Tool Bag is Made from Premium Materials – Rust Proof Zippers , Quality Straps with Reliable Buckles and a Water , Grease & Rip Resistant Heavy Duty Fabric , Strong as a Canvas Tool Roll – This Toll Roll Will Keep Your Tools Safe in Extreme Work Conditions
Easy to Carry & Hang – Keep your Tools & Accessories Organized and Carry Them in a Folded Roll Up Organizer – Hang The Tool Bag Organizer in Your Car Garage or Workshop
A Great & Useful Gift – This Tool Roll Organizer is a Must Have for any Skilled Workman ; Mechanic Repairman Carpenter Plumber Electrician & Hobbyist – The Wrench Roll Up Pouch can be Used as a Car / Motorcycle Tool Roll for Repairs or Emergency Kit – Don’t Miss a Chance to Buy a Gift that will Surely be Appreciated

The Ryker Bag was Created to be an Accessible and Affordable Brand that Makes Every Manual Laborer’s Life Easier for Organization and Transport.

We’ve Taken Everything we Know About Tools and Created the Most Compact and Most Convenient Roll Up Bag that we know how.

Now it’s Your Turn to Enjoy the Benefit of our Vast Experience and the Expertise of the Designers who Put this Dream into Action!

NEW 6 TOOL POUCHES DESIGN

  • 4 Long Pockets 11.8 x 3.3” with Heavy Duty Zippers for all your Tools, Cables, Cutters, and More.
  • 2 Short Removable Pockets 5.3 x 3” to House all those Little Bits & Pieces that so Easily get Lost. This Includes Nuts, Bolts, Screws, Anchors and More.
  • Each Small Tool Pouch comes with a D-clip which you can Clip onto your Pants or Belt for Super Convenience.

When it comes to Work Tools, you Need a Light-Weight, Compact, but Spacious Tools Bag to Organize and Carry them, and you Surely want it to be Sturdy and Safe. This is why we Designed the Ryker Tool Bag to Suit all your Tool Handling Needs, Packed it with Neat Features and Manufactured it from Premium Heavy-Duty Materials!

We Call it a Small Tool Roll Because it’s Certainly Smaller than the Average Tool Box but at 20.3” in Length and 12.8” Wide, this Handy Roll Up Tool Bag Provides you with all the Space you Need to Organize and Carry your Tools, Accessories, Cords, and any other Gear you may Need in your Day’s Work.

SUPER DURABLE – A TOOL BAG MADE FOR LIFE

FABRIC TO PROTECT

  • Made of heavy-duty 1000D fabric
  • Water resistant
  • Grease retardant
  • Rip resistant

Protect your work gear from harmful agents at work such as rust & dirt to keep them in the best condition for longer.

FOLD IT ANY WHICH WAY

Designed with your convenience in mind, there are many ways you can fold and carry the tool roll organizer. For this purpose there are several handles so you can carry your tools with maximum ease.

EXTREME ATTENTION TO DETAIL

  • All zippers are rust-proof and of the highest quality
  • Stitching is done with thick nylon thread
  • All straps and buckles are designed to make life easier for you.

Read more

LIMITLESS POSSIBILITIES FOR PROFESSIONALS, DIYers, STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

ALL YOUR ESSENTIAL HAND TOOLS IN ONE PLACE

Safely store your wrenches, pliers, screwdrivers and more. No more running back to the car or the garage to find that missing tool.

CAR/BIKE REPAIR TOOLS

Save space in the back of your car with this compact tool option. You’ll never find yourself left out in the cold and without the necessary tools to fix your bike or car.

STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

No more bulky and unsuitable bags. Arrive at your lesson or work spot, open up your Ryker roll up bag and see everything you need right in front of you.

GEEKS & TECHIES

Every possible

computer cable, part and accessory at your fingertips where you need it and when you need it. Organize & store for absolute control.

Read more

MORE GREAT FEATURES INCLUDE:

  • Metal Grommets to hang the bag when open on the wall
  • Additional outer D-Rings on which you can attach keys, tape measure and other small items
  • Mesh pocket on the front side. Place your name tag with telephone number so there’s no chance of you losing the bag and your precious tools.

Read more
